title: Thailand: land of rice
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Milan Herzog
brief_description: Presents a view of Thailand and its people, including sequences on rice farming, the way of life of a typical farm family, and the floating markets on the canals and harbour of Bangkok.
description: Presents a view of Thailand and its people, including sequences on rice farming, the way of life of a typical farm family, and the floating markets on the canals and harbour of Bangkok.
